home.label: Home
home.title: {name}'s Portfolio
home.description: Portfolio website showcasing my work as a {role}
home.headline: Design engineer and builder
home.subline: I'm Selene, a design engineer at FLY, where I craft intuitive user experiences. After hours, I build my own projects.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Selene is a Jakarta-based design engineer with a passion for transforming complex challenges into simple, elegant design solutions. Her work spans digital interfaces, interactive experiences, and the convergence of design and technology.

FLY.achievements: Redesigned the UI/UX for the FLY platform, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement and 30% faster load times.;Spearheaded the integration of AI tools into design workflows, enabling designers to iterate 50% faster.

Creativ3.achievements: Developed a design system that unified the brand across multiple platforms, improving design consistency by 40%.;Led a cross-functional team to launch a new product line, contributing to a 15% increase in overall company revenue.

Build the Future.description: Studied online marketing and personal branding.

ProductStrategy.title: Product Strategy
ProductStrategy.description: Finding the intersection of user needs and business goals is a passion of mine. I thrive on what comes next, creating and executing a plan to realize those goals while finding ways derisk assumptions and deliver value sooner.

DecisionMaking.title: Decision making
DecisionMaking.description: I like the one-way, two-way door framework to guide how much time to spend on decisions. I pride myself in spending the right amount of time on decisions and using the right tool, be that analytics, surveys, interviews, insights from the sales team, or just 'product instincts'.

Empowerment.title: Empowerment
Empowerment.description: I always strive to empower others to work autonomously. If I've shared enough customer insights and business justifications that a designer, engieer or another product manager can make a good descion without me, I feel like I'm doing my job well.

Communication.title: Communication
Communication.description: Product management is a team sport, so keeping stakeholders aligned and informed is key. As I've progressed in my career, my apprecaition for effective communication has grown.
